Class TxStream

A class representing a transmit stream. With this class, you can write samples to your device to transmit.

Write(nint, uint, StreamFlags, long, int, out StreamResult)

Write data from an unmanaged pointer for a single-channel transmission. Minimal validation is performed on input parameters.

Declaration
public ErrorCode Write(nint ptr, uint numElems, StreamFlags flags, long timeNs, int timeoutUs, out StreamResult result)
Parameters
Type Name Description
nint ptr

A pointer to the buffer to send.
uint numElems

The number of elements (of the stream format's size) in the underlying buffer.
StreamFlags flags

Optional input flags.
long timeNs

The buffer's timestamp in nanoseconds.
int timeoutUs

The operation timeout in microseconds.
StreamResult result

An output to store stream metadata.
Returns
Type Description
ErrorCode

An error code for the stream operation.

Write(nint[], uint, StreamFlags, long, int, out StreamResult)

Write data from unmanaged pointers for a multi-channel transmission. Minimal validation is performed on input parameters except channel count.

Declaration
public ErrorCode Write(nint[] ptrs, uint numElems, StreamFlags flags, long timeNs, int timeoutUs, out StreamResult result)
Parameters
Type Name Description
nint[] ptrs

Pointers to the buffers to send.
uint numElems

The number of elements (of the stream format's size) in each underlying buffer.
StreamFlags flags

Optional input flags.
long timeNs

The buffer's timestamp in nanoseconds.
int timeoutUs

The operation timeout in microseconds.
StreamResult result

An output to store stream metadata.
Returns
Type Description
ErrorCode

An error code for the stream operation.

Write<T>(ReadOnlyMemory<T>, StreamFlags, long, int, out StreamResult)

Write data from an arbitrary memory source for a single-channel transmission.

Declaration
public ErrorCode Write<T>(ReadOnlyMemory<T> memory, StreamFlags flags, long timeNs, int timeoutUs, out StreamResult result) where T : unmanaged
Parameters
Type Name Description
ReadOnlyMemory<T> memory

The buffer to transmit. For complex types, this buffer is interleaved.
StreamFlags flags

Optional input flags.
long timeNs

The buffer's timestamp in nanoseconds.
int timeoutUs

The operation timeout in microseconds.
StreamResult result

An output to store stream metadata.
Returns
Type Description
ErrorCode

An error code for the stream operation.
Type Parameters
Name Description
T

The type of the underlying buffer to send. This type must match the stream's format type.

Write<T>(T[][], StreamFlags, long, int, out StreamResult)

Write data from a managed C# array for a multi-channel transmission.

Declaration
public ErrorCode Write<T>(T[][] buffs, StreamFlags flags, long timeNs, int timeoutUs, out StreamResult result) where T : unmanaged
Parameters
Type Name Description
T[][] buffs

The managed arrays to transmit. For complex types, this buffer is interleaved. The outer array dimension must match the number of channels, and all inner arrays must be of the same length.
StreamFlags flags

Optional input flags.
long timeNs

The buffer's timestamp in nanoseconds.
int timeoutUs

The operation timeout in microseconds.
StreamResult result

An output to store stream metadata.
Returns
Type Description
ErrorCode

An error code for the stream operation.
Type Parameters
Name Description
T

The type of the underlying arrays to send. This type must match the stream's format type.
